description:
Adapted from the classic legend, the descendants of Cowherd and Weaver Girl continue to write a new adventure! The twenty-eight constellations contain the power of stars, which can destroy the world. Unfortunately, the Weaver Girl in charge of the constellations was greedy for the mortal world, causing the stars to escape, causing disasters. Many years later, the Weaver Girl`s son Jinfeng came to the mortal world for his mother, and teamed up with the mortal girl Xiaofan to conquer the stars. Accompanied by humans and gods, they encountered many dangers along the way, and the mystery of Xiaofan`s life experience and the truth of the Weaver Girl`s crime gradually surfaced...
source: bilibili.com/googletranslate
